info.description: Human Capital Management enables authorized users to access a variety of labor tracking needs, such as attendance management, employee scheduling, project tracking, benefit entitlements, and payroll preparation.
info.title: Human Capital Management

tags.description:
From here you may browse our library of API resources, organized hierarchically by domain, or major functional area, logical subgroup, API resource, and all available operations against that resource. For more information about the concepts and technology behind our API, refer to the [Foundations](doc:foundations-doc) documentation.

Our platform provides a powerful application programming interface and documentation to help you develop secure, scalable, and high-performance applications that leverage the full breadth of capabilities offered by our backend services.

The API is founded on a pragmatic implementation of the [representational state transfer](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_State_Transfer) architectural style and allows access to your organization's workforce management data using common HTTP methods and the [JSON](http://www.json.org) interchange format.

tags.description: This resource allows you to retrieve people profiles. A people profile contains information about a profile including: its id, persistentId and name.
tags.name: People Profiles

tags.description:
This resource provides a set of operations that allow you to retrieve and manipulate profile field maps.

A profile field map contains information about a profile template field, a profile template, people profiles, and associated values.
tags.name: Profile Field Maps

tags.description: This resource allows you to retrieve profile templates. A profile template contains information about profile template and people profiles associated with it.
tags.name: Profile Templates

post.description: This operation aggregates and returns payroll according to the specified parameters. This operation accepts parameters such as person details, a list of employee details, a date range, whether or not to ignore signoff, pay statement type, include or exclude paycodes and ILPs.

get.description:
This operation returns all people profiles.


The associated Access Control Point is PROFILE_TEMPLATE.

post.description:
This operation returns a list of people profiles by object references.


The associated Access Control Point is PROFILE_TEMPLATE.

200.description: Successfully retrieved a list of people profiles.

[WCO-127906] - Some people profiles object references do not exist.
